thread.section_title: Think Protection Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Think Protection | thinkprotection.com
thread.title: Nikki Geddes
thread.title_full: Think Protection reviewed by Nikki Geddes

author: Nikki Geddes
title: Nikki Geddes
text: I've just purchased the equipment from David as of today and with this exceptional service and full knowledge, I am very confident I am doing a very good thing cancelling Sears and have Think Protection as my home service. I was so well informed by David. He even mentioned about getting registered which no one is informed about and have no knowledge of doing so because they were never informed by their alarm system. What was great also is the Private guard service for only 4.99$ monthly... I jumped on that service. That is genius offering that service. Thank you kindly David!
